mapper.sql: id, batch_no, case_name, module_name, case_owner, case_step_num, result, case_start_time, case_end_time, case_duration
mapper.select:
select
from tb_testcase
and batch_no like concat('%',#{batchNo},'%')
and case_name like concat('%',#{caseName},'%')
and module_name like concat('%',#{moduleName},'%')
and case_owner like concat('%',#{caseOwner},'%')
and result like concat('%',#{result},'%')
order by
id desc
id asc
id desc
mapper.insert: insert into tb_testcase (id, batch_no, case_name, module_name, case_owner, case_step_num, result, case_start_time, case_end_time, case_duration) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseStepNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{result,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{caseStartTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{caseEndTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{caseDuration,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into tb_testcase
id,
batch_no,

mapper.update:
update tb_testcase
batch_no = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
case_name = #{caseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
module_name = #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
case_owner = #{caseOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
case_step_num = #{caseStepNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
result = #{result,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
case_start_time = #{caseStartTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
case_end_time = #{caseEndTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
case_duration = #{caseDuration,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_testcase set batch_no = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, case_name = #{caseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, module_name = #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, case_owner = #{caseOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, case_step_num = #{caseStepNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, result = #{result,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, case_start_time = #{caseStartTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, case_end_time = #{caseEndTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, case_duration = #{caseDuration,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
